item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 17, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Deep Learning Is Not So Mysterious or Different (127 points | 20 comments)
2. Archival Storage (13 points | discuss)
3. Show HN: Localscope–Limit scope of Python functions for reproducible execution (22 points | 12 comments)

25. Alphabet spins out Taara – Internet over lasers (49 points | 52 comments)
26. Docs – Open source alternative to Notion or Outline (1741 points | 431 comments)
27. Zlib-rs is faster than C (312 points | 418 comments)
28. The Alexa feature "do not send voice recordings" you enabled no longer available (801 points | 557 comments)
29. Did the Particle Go Through the Two Slits, or Did the Wave Function? (199 points | 258 comments)
